::Havoc/Repressor::

Havoc slows down, seeing another bot near the pod that they were going
for. He transforms into robot mode and cautiously approaches, still in the
air.

"State your rank and function!" he orders the bot, confident that in a
fight the three Warmachines could easily take out any other bot. Repressor
flies behind him, both missile launchers of his vehicle mode ready to
fire.



On Mon, 30 Apr 2001, RoboRick007 wrote:

> ::Demolition::
> 
> He transformes to plane mode, and follows the other War Machines towards
> the pod.
>
